properties.name: Fishbone's
properties.description: Posted by Glbabooks 400 Monroe St, Detroit, 48226Fishbone\'s GFishbone\'s Greektown is a "hot spot" for locals and visitors alike. This up-scale seafood, steak and sushi house boasts an extensive menu of Creole and classic American fare, including prime steaks and chops, fresh fish, pastas and daily specials. This Motown destination features two sprawling bars, multi level seating, an open kitchen and huge shuttered windows.

properties.name: Seldom Blues
properties.description: Posted by Glbabooks  400 Renaissance Center Detroit, MI 48243Detroit’s premier jazz restaurant and supper club, overlooking the Detroit River, offers a unique downtown dining and entertainment experience in the prestigious GM Renaissance Center. A cutting-edge, contemporary menu featuring continental cuisine with a French flair. From a magnificent Sunday Brunch, to a signature lunch and unforgettable dinner, Seldom Blues has changed the Detroit dining landscape forever.

properties.name: Shrine of the Black Madonna
properties.description: Posted by Glbabooks 13535 Livernois Ave. Detroit, MI 48238. (313) 491-0777.In 1970, the Shrine of the Black Madonna Cultural Center & Bookstore ("The Shrine") first opened its doors with the goal of showcasing the creative talents of artists & authors of African descent and empowering people through educational workshops & cultural events. The Shrine is one of the nation\'s largest & oldest black-owned bookstores, with locations in Detroit, Atlanta & Houston. Our locations range in size from 5,000 sq. ft to 20,000 sq. feet of retail space. Whether looking for classics, children\'s books, or the latest titles, visitors can find it at the Shrine. The Shrine Bookstore is a landmark cultural institution which not only contains over 17,000 titles related to the Black experience, but also carries quality art, artifacts, jewelry, apparel, home decor, and music. As a consistent winner of "Best Afro-centric Bookstore" in each of our cities, we bring the best of the African Diaspora to the community.

properties.name: Sweet Georgia Brown's
properties.description: Posted by Glbabooks 1045 Brush St. Detroit, MI 48226Detroit’s Sweet Georgia Brown is an extremely fine, upscale, American restaurant, with an eclectic and creative menu.
